revised_title: Plutonic Xenoliths and Their Relation to the Upper Mantle: A Geochemical Survey
tldr: The authors conducted a geochemical survey of ultramafic xenoliths from various locations, finding regional differences in upper mantle material that can be explained by partial fusion and extraction of the liquid phase. They also discuss the relevance of chemical models for understanding the composition of the upper mantle and its implications for petrology and geophysics.
